text:
Folks,

I am withdrawing from Liftoff for personal reasons. It's been an honor to work with you all.

While I will no longer be in the Slack, I am willing to continue to organize KC online meetups, but someone else will have to take over the Slack communication along those lines.

You can contact me at <mailto:lbr50qns@duck.com|lbr50qns@duck.com>, if you like, but no obligations! Feel free to share that e-mail address with anyone in LaunchCode, but I think I've exchanged contact information with almost everyone, already.
